Forced - At the beginning of the enemy phase, if there are any [elder_thing] or [tablet] tokens sealed here: Mater Tenebrarum immediately attacks the investigator with the lowest [combat], regardless of her location.
cards.traits: Ancient One. Three Mothers. Witch. Elite.

cards.name: Thread of Darkness (Whispers)
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, move a non-[tablet] symbol token from Mater Tenebrarum to Mater Suspiriorum. If you cannot, search the chaos bag for a non-[cultist], non-[auto_fail] symbol token and seal it on Mater Tenebrarum. If you can do neither, Mater Tenebrarum makes an immediate attack against you.

cards.name: Thread of Darkness (Grief)
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, move a non-[elder_thing] symbol token from Mater Tenebrarum to Mater Lachrymarum. If you cannot, search the chaos bag for a non-[cultist], non-[auto_fail] symbol token and seal it on Mater Tenebrarum. If you can do neither, Mater Tenebrarum makes an immediate attack against you.

cards.name: Thread of Sighs (Shadow)
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, move a non-[cultist] symbol token from Mater Suspiriorum to Mater Tenebrarum. If you cannot, search the chaos bag for a non-[tablet], non-[auto_fail] symbol token and seal it on Mater Suspiriorum. If you can do neither, Mater Suspiriorum makes an immediate attack against you.

cards.name: Thread of Sighs (Grief)
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, move a non-[elder_thing] symbol token from Mater Suspiriorum to Mater Lachrymarum. If you cannot, search the chaos bag for a non-[tablet], non-[auto_fail] symbol token and seal it on Mater Suspiriorum. If you can do neither, Mater Suspiriorum makes an immediate attack against you.

cards.name: Thread of Tears (Whispers)
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, move symbol token from Mater Lachrymarum to Mater Suspiriorum. If you cannot, search the chaos bag for a non-[elder_thing], non-[auto_fail] symbol token and seal it on Mater Lachrymarum. If you can do neither, Mater Lachrymarum makes an immediate attack against you.

cards.name: Thread of Tears (Shadow)
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, move a non-[cultist] symbol token from Mater Lachrymarum to Mater Tenebrarum. If you cannot, search the chaos bag for a non-[elder_thing], non-[auto_fail] symbol token and seal it on Mater Lachrymarum. If you can do neither, Mater Lachrymarum makes an immediate attack against you.

cards.flavor:
The interior of the Court of Sorrows begins to shift, shaping itself to suit the whims and memories of its new queen. Drunk on her newfound power, Maddalena---what remains of her---lies at the court's heart, and she has no intention of letting you leave. 
You, after all, are a loose end. And loose ends must be cut clean.
cards.name: Wayward Daughter
cards.text: Mater Personarum is considered to be at each location with a chaos token sealed on it. Jinx -- Release a token sealed on Mater Personarum. You must release a symbol token, if possible. Objective - If Mater Personarum has at least 1 [cultist], 1 [tablet], 1 [elder_thing], and X other chaos tokens sealed on her: Advance. X is the number of cards tucked underneath the Act.

cards.name: Restless Eyes
cards.text:
The sound that Mater Personarum's masklike faces make isn’t a just single scream---each shriek is layered atop one another, twisted up into a single, atonal dirge. The aura around her falters, whatever sheen of divine invincibility her magic allowed her control of extinguished in an instant. She howls curses at you---defiance, fury, pride. But it’s a bluff.
Exhaust Mater Personarum and deal 1 [per_investigator] damage to her. If Great Daemon Stolas is in the Victory Display, spawn him at Golgothan Depths, exhausted. He does not ready during the following upkeep phase.

cards.flavor: Even now, reincarnated as a newborn goddess, Maddalena has always been blinded by her own spite. It is time to make her see.
cards.name: Perfection Undone
cards.text: Mater Personarum is considered to be at each location with a chaos token sealed on it. Jinx -- Release a token sealed on Mater Personarum. You must release a symbol token, if possible. Objective - If Mater Personarum is defeated: Advance.

cards.name: The Old Echo Fades
cards.text:
Her end is not grand. It is not regal. It is quiet. The masks orbiting her head, twisted in rage and fear. Her many eyes blink out one by one, tiny pinpricks of golden light fading into darkness. "This is mine. It was always mine! The Mothers are gone, and I… I was to be… I was supposed to be-" Her voice breaks. There’s a crack, and her body shudders as a long fissure carves itself down her center, from crown to navel. Maddalena scrambles to press the seam shut. Her eyes---all of them---shift toward you. It’s not rage anymore in her voice. It’s something far worse. Something human. "Don’t let me die like this."
→R2.

cards.name: Eternal Silence
cards.text: Forced - At the end of the round, if there is not a chaos token sealed here: Seal a random non-[auto_fail] token on Eternal Silence from the chaos bag. [free] Spend 1 [per_investigator] clues: Seal the token sealed here on an enemy at this location. [action] Spend 1 clue: Release the token sealed here, and seal a different non-[auto_fail] token on Eternal Silence.

cards.name: Golgothan Depths
cards.text: Forced - At the end of the round, if there is not a chaos token sealed here: Seal a random non-[auto_fail] token on Golgothan Depths from the chaos bag. [reaction] If you successfully attack an enemy at Golgothan Depths: Seal the token sealed here on that enemy. [free] Take 1 damage: Release the token sealed here.

cards.name: The Seat of Aradia
cards.text: Forced - At the end of the round, if no chaos token is sealed here: Seal a random non-[auto_fail] token from the chaos bag on The Seat of Aradia. While Mater Personarum is at this location, she gets +2 fight, +2 evade, and gains retaliate. [free] Spend 1 [per_investigator] clues: Seal the token sealed here on an enemy at The Seat of Aradia. Seal a random non-[auto_fail] token on The Seat of Aradia. [reaction] After you succeed at a fight action against an enemy at The Seat of Aradia, reveal X tokens from the chaos bag and choose one to seal on that enemy. Seal a different non-[auto_fail] token on The Seat of Aradia. X is the amount you succeeded by.

cards.name: Templum Trium
cards.text: Forced - At the end of the round, if there is not a chaos token sealed here: Seal a random non-[auto_fail] token on Templum Trium from the chaos bag. [reaction] If you succeed at a test on a non-weakness Treachery at this location: Seal the token sealed here on an enemy at this location. [free] Take 1 horror: Release the token sealed here.

cards.name: Great Daemon Stolas
cards.text: Hunter. Elusive. Jinxed. Spawn - Golgothan Depths Forced - At the beginning of the enemy phase, if Great Daemon Stolas is ready: Return the lowest-modifier token sealed on Mater Personarum to the chaos bag.

cards.name: Mater Personarum
cards.text: Mater Personarum cannot be damaged unless there are at least 1 [cultist], 1 [tablet], 1 [elder_thing], and X other chaos tokens sealed here. X is the number of cards tucked underneath the Act. Forced - When Mater Personarum attacks: She deals either her damage or her horror, instead of both.

cards.name: Deceitful Dancer
cards.text:
Hunter. Elusive. Jinxed.
[reaction] If a test you are taking defeats Deceitful Dancer: Shuffle her back into the encounter deck and seal a non-[auto_fail] chaos token you revealed during that test on Mater Personarum.

cards.name: Boon of Cruelty
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - You must decide (choose one): - Release X chaos tokens sealed on Mater Personarum. X is half the number of cards tucked underneath the act, rounded up. - Mater Personarum immediately attacks you, regardless of her location. - Add 1 doom to the agenda. This doom may cause the agenda to advance.

cards.name: Trivial Pursuit
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (5). If you fail, release a number of tokens sealed on the nearest enemy in play equal to the amount you failed by. If you released no tokens after failing this test, Trivial Pursuit gains surge.

cards.flavor: This is how the Palace of Sorrows dies. Not by the grace of shadows, sighs, or tears, but by the primal fury of Hekate: empress of the space between spaces, mother of the line between life and death. If you do not take advantage of her mercy, this will be how you die, too.
cards.name: Katabasis
cards.text: Forced - Agenda 3a gets +1 [per_investigator] total doom threshold. Forced - When your location is Erased: Deal 1 direct damage and 1 direct horror to each investigator at that location, then move to the nearest remaining location in play. Then, if the Court of Sorrows is the only remaining location in play: Each remaining investigator is defeated. [free] Investigators at your location spend 1 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Replace an Empty Space connected to your location with the top card of the Fading Palace deck. Jinx -- Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, Hekate Enodia Erases the furthest location from the Court of Sorrows. (Limit once per round.) Objective - If each investigator has resigned: Advance.

cards.name: Between the Lines
cards.text: It's a true leap of faith you make when the time comes to pitch yourself through through the threshold at the center of the crossroads. There's no ground beneath you; no up, no down. Just the deafening roar of nothing pressing in on your entire being from all sides. It could be the Palace of Sorrows singing out its death throes as it's reduced to stardust and memories behind you, or the horrible, liminal sound of the void itself---it's hard to say. It's hard to think at all when it feels like every fiber of your being is about to come apart at the seams. For a moment, you're sure this is it. You're certain that you're fraying into nothing, just like Maddalena must have done. And then, finally, impact. →R3.

cards.name: Astral Crossroads
cards.text: If this location has no clues on it and at least 4 of the following are true, this location gains "[action]: Resign." - "You defeated the Crossroads' Guardian." - "You paid tribute to the Hunt." - "You paid tribute to the Night." - "You scryed a way home." - "You broke a daemon's shackles." - "You took Declan O'Doyle's Bargain."

cards.flavor:
"I call the goddess of the roads
and places where three ways meet. 
Heavenly, earthly, and in the sea, 
the saffron---cloaked goddess of graves, 
sepulchral spirit who revels with the souls of the dead."
-----The Orphic Hymn to Hekate, trans. Patrick Dunn

Collapsing Skyway
cards.text: Forced - When you enter Collapsing Skyway, you must immediately spend 1 clue or take 1 damage. [reaction] If you end your turn at Collapsing Skyway, take 1 damage: Move your investigator to a revealed copy of Unraveling Courtyard or Crumbling Collonade.

cards.flavor: Dead gray sand falls from overhead in rivers, swallowing the towering statues of the Three Mothers that fill this massive chamber.

cards.text: Jinxed. [action] If there are no clues on this location: Search your play area, hand, deck, and discard pile for the Great Prince Stolas story asset. Then, take 1 direct damage, 1 direct horror, and exile him from your deck. Remember that "you broke a daemon's shackles."

-----The Orphic Hymn to Hekate, trans. Patrick Dunn

cards.text: Forced - When you would move out of Endless Corridors, test [agility] or [willpower] (3). If you fail, move to a different copy of Endless Corridors instead of your intended destination. If you cannot, cancel the effects of this move. (Limit once per turn.)

cards.flavor:

and places where three ways meet.

-----The Orphic Hymn to Hekate, trans. Patrick Dunn
cards.name: Fading Palace

cards.flavor:
The moon shines brightly in the distant sky 
as the chamber trembles under Hekate's rage.
cards.name: Frostbitten Balcony
cards.text: Jinxed. [action]: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (10). You may exile any number of non-weakness cards from your hand or play area to reduce the difficulty of this test by 3 per card exiled. If you succeed, remember that "you paid tribute to the Night."

cards.flavor:
"I call the goddess of the roads
and places where three ways meet. 
Heavenly, earthly, and in the sea, 
the saffron---cloaked goddess of graves, 
sepulchral spirit who revels with the souls of the dead."
-----The Orphic Hymn to Hekate, trans. Patrick Dunn
cards.name: Fading Palace

cards.flavor: Yet another shrine to the Sorrows' vanity, crumbling under the weight of Hekate's temper. At the base of the figure meant to be Tenebrarum, a name is etched into the marble: "Diana."
cards.name: Altar of Fading Sorrow
cards.text: Jinxed. [action]: Investigators at your location take a combined total of 3 damage and 3 horror, distributed as you wish. Remember that "you paid tribute to the Hunt."

cards.flavor:

and places where three ways meet. 
Heavenly, earthly, and in the sea, 
the saffron---cloaked goddess of graves, 
sepulchral spirit who revels with the souls of the dead."
-----The Orphic Hymn to Hekate, trans. Patrick Dunn

cards.flavor:
The mirrors atop this dais don’t just show reflections---
each one offers glimpses into a different future. You just need to find one where you make it out of here alive.
cards.name: Shrine of Mirrors
cards.text: Jinxed. [action]: Test [willpower](6). If you succeed, remember that "you scryed a way home." You may spend 2 additional actions for this test to automatically succeed.

cards.flavor:

-----The Orphic Hymn to Hekate, trans. Patrick Dunn

Unraveling Courtyard
cards.text: [free] If there are 3 or less cards tucked beneath the act deck, spend 2 resources: Look at the reverse side of an unrevealed copy of Fading Palace adjacent to this location. (Limit once per round.) Forced - When you enter Unraveling Courtyard, if there are 4 or more cards tucked beneath the act deck: Lose 1 action.

cards.name: Fading Palace
Hekate Enodia
cards.text: Hekate Enodia is omnipotent and unknowable. She is immune to all player card effects and investigator actions, and cannot be defeated by any means. Forced - At the end of the round, Hekate Enodia Erases the furthest location from The Court of Sorrows from existence (no investigators, if possible). Put that location on the bottom of the Fading Palace deck and replace it with the top card of the lead investigator's deck as Empty Space.

cards.name: Hekatoncheir
cards.text: Spawn - Astral Crossroads. Otherwise, Furthest location in play. Retaliate. Massive. Jinx. Forced - When a location is Erased: Move Hekatoncheir once toward that location. [reaction]When Hekatoncheir is defeated: Remember that "you defeated the Crossroads' Guardian."

cards.name: Hound of Hekate
cards.text: Spawn - The Court of Sorrows Hunter. Massive. Hound of Hekate can enter Empty Space as if it were a location. Locations adjacent to Hound of Hekate's location gain the jinxed keyword.

cards.name: Blight the Path
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - You must decide (choose one): - Hekate Enodia deals her damage or horror value to each investigator at your location. - Erase any locations occupying the following positions:

cards.name: Merciful Oblivion
cards.text: Peril. You must decide (choose one): - Heal 2 damage or 2 horror. Each [[Fading]] location connected to your current location is Erased. - Take 2 damage or 2 horror and replace any Empty Space connected to your current location from the top of the Fading Palace deck. - Take 1 damage and 1 horror. Merciful Oblivion gains surge.

cards.flavor: Our Lady can approach only those in whom a profound nature has been upheaved; in whom the heart trembles away from the world and roils in pain from within.
cards.name: Lightless Supplicant
cards.text: Hunter. Jinxed. Forced - If Lightless Supplicant is at a location with a shroud of 4 or higher: He gains retaliate, +1 fight, and +1 damage.

cards.flavor:
"The real world is simply too terrible to admit; it tells man that he is a small, trembling animal who will decay and die."
---Ernest Becker
cards.name: Death's Head Familiar
cards.text: Spawn - Empty location. (No clues, if possible.) Aloof. Jinxed. Forced - After Death's Head Familiar enters play: Place 1 doom on it.

cards.flavor:
"Banish their frail hope, my dear Sister. 
Curse them as only thou canst curse."
cards.name: Abominable Visions
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - Test [willpower] or [intellect] (4). If you fail and you tested [willpower], take 1 horror. Then, lose 1 resource for each point you failed by. If you fail and you tested [intellect], take 1 horror. Then, discard 1 random card from your hand for each point you failed by.

cards.flavor:
Our Lady's eyes keep watch over those with perishing dreams; the betrayed, the outcasts, the disgraced. 
Hers is the kingdom of the meek and the hopeless.
cards.name: Twining Supplicant
cards.text: Elusive. Jinxed. Forced - You cannot commit a single card to tests against Twining Supplicant.

cards.flavor:
"There are no ordinary cats."
---Colette
cards.name: Lissome Familiar
cards.text: Aloof. Jinxed. Spawn - Connecting location. (Unrevealed, if possible.) Forced - When you enter Lissome Familiar's location: It attacks you.

cards.name: Sighs from the Depths
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, put Sighs from the Depths into play next to the agenda deck. While Sighs from the Depths is in play, each non-[[Elite]] enemy with aloof and/or patrol keywords loses those keywords and gains hunter and elusive, instead. [action][action]: Discard Sighs from the Depths. Any investigator may trigger this ability.

cards.flavor:
Our Lady is intrudes into the chambers of the 
sleepless and mourning like a ghost. 
Hers is the kingdom of loss and grief.
cards.name: Keening Supplicant
cards.text: Hunter. Jinxed. Forced - When you defeat Keening Supplicant: Choose a non-weakness card under your control in your hand or in your play-area. Remove it from the game.

cards.flavor:
"No one ever told me that grief felt so like fear. The same fluttering in the stomach, the same restlessness, 
the yawning. I keep on swallowing."
---C.S. Lewis
cards.name: Weeping Familiar
cards.text: Hunter. Jinxed. Forced - When Weeping Familiar is defeated: Draw the topmost [[Hex]] treachery in the encounter discard pile.

cards.flavor:
One for sorrow, two for mirth,
Three for death, and four for birth,
Five for silver, six for gold,
Seven for a secret never to be told.
cards.name: One For Sorrow
cards.text: Revelation - Put One For Sorrow into play next to the Agenda deck. While One For Sorrow is in play, the current Jinx gains the following text: "Remove an asset under your control from the game." [action]: Test (3) [willpower]. If you succeed, discard One For Sorrow. If you fail, trigger the current Jinx. This test automatically succeeds if an exhausted enemy is at your location.

cards.flavor: A smile can get you far. A smile with a gun can get you further.
cards.name: Syndicate Underboss
cards.text: Spawn - Revealed location with the least clues. Retaliate. Forced - After the enemy phase begins: Discard the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. Spawn each [[Syndicate]] enemy discarded by this effect at Syndicate Underboss's location.

cards.flavor: He's the hammer. You're the nail.
cards.name: Syndicate Fixer
cards.text: Hunter. Retaliate. Forced - When Syndicate Fixer engages you, you must discard 1 random card from your hand. If you cannot, he attacks you. After enemies finish moving during the enemy phase, if an enemy not named Syndicate Fixer is at this card's location: Move this card to a connecting location (revealed, if possible.)

cards.flavor:
"Nothing personal---it's just business." 
---Otto Berman
cards.name: Syndicate Firing Squad
cards.text: Spawn - Connecting location. Hunter. Forced - If Syndicate Firing Squad would be defeated and it is not exhausted: Set Syndicate Firing Squad's remaining health to 1 and exhaust it, instead.

cards.name: Rain of Bullets
cards.text: Revelation - Test [agility] (2). This test gets +1 difficulty for every [[Syndicate]] enemy at your location and each connecting location. If you fail, each investigator at your location takes 1 damage.

cards.flavor:
"There's no such thing as good money or bad money. There's just money." 
---Lucky Luciano
cards.name: Hired Triggermen
cards.text:
Hunter.
[reaction] If Hired Triggermen would attack you during the enemy phase, spend 3 resources: Cancel that attack.

cards.name: Designated Victim
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, put Designated Victim in the threat area of the investigator with the lowest remaining health. You trigger attacks of opportunity from enemies at your location as if they were engaged with you. Forced - At the end of your turn, test [agility] (3). If you succeed, discard Designated Victim. You may add 1 doom to the agenda to automatically succeed. This doom may cause the agenda to advance.

cards.flavor: Why is everyone so ready to think the worst is over?
cards.name: Exquisite Fear
cards.text: Jinxed. Revelation - Put Exquisite Fear in your threat area. Forced - Each time you take 1 or more horror : You take 1 additional horror. [action]: Take 1 horror. Discard Exquisite Fear.

cards.name: Object of Obsession
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - Place this treachery in the threat area of an investigator of your choice without an existing copy of Object of Obsession. Forced - While Object of Obsession is in your threat area, whenever another investigator resolves the effects of a failed test on a treachery card with the jinxed keyword: You must decide (choose one): - You also resolve the effects of the failed test. - Put 1 doom on Object of Obsession. Forced - When the act or agenda advances: Discard Object of Obsession.

cards.flavor:
Mr. O'Doyle had not been a resident of the Three Conies, but his mangled, twisted body was discovered in the 
second floor corridor early this morning.
cards.name: Finlay O'Doyle
cards.text: Jinxed. Hunter.

cards.flavor:
A former rum runner for the O'Bannions, Mr. Mulligan's corpse was found in his apartment in the early 
afternoon in an advanced state of deterioration.
cards.name: Frankie Mulligan
cards.text: Jinxed. Hunter.

cards.flavor:
Mr. Johnson's body was the first to be 
discovered this morning, but none of the wounds 
he was found covered in make any sense.
cards.name: Rufus Johnson
cards.text: Jinxed. Hunter.

cards.name: Catastrophic Drop
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Catastrophic Drop to your location. Forced - If you end your turn at this location: Test [agility] (2)+X, where X is the number of resource tokens on Catastrophic Drop. If you succeed, put 1 resource token on Catastrophic Drop. If you fail, discard Catastrophic Drop and each investigator at this location takes 1 damage and 1 horror.

cards.name: Crumbling Foundations
cards.text: Revelation - Test [agility] (3). If you fail, you must either discard an asset under your control or each investigator at your location takes 1 damage.

cards.name: Backdraft
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Backdraft to your location. Forced - After you move to or from Backdraft's location, you must either take 1 damage or lose 1 action. [free] Test [agility] (4). If you succeed, discard Backdraft and you may immediately take an action as if it were your turn (this action does not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn). Otherwise, take 1 direct damage.

cards.name: Conflagration
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Conflagration to your location. Forced - At the end of the round, if you are at Conflagration's location or a connecting location: Take 1 damage. [free] Test [agility] (3). If you succeed, discard Conflagration. Otherwise, take 1 damage.

cards.flavor:
Olga screams wildly as her grotesque ballet contorts 
her body into impossible shapes.
cards.name: Olga Safronova
cards.text: Aloof. Alert. Revelation - Place one of the set-aside keys on Olga Safronova. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: If Olga Safronova is unengaged, move her 1 location away from the nearest investigator (to a location with no investigators, if possible). If she is engaged, disengage her instead.

cards.flavor:
Olga twirls about the room like a marionette on invisible strings, 
each movement more erratic and jarring than the next. 
Fresh blood seeps through the soles of her ballet slippers.
cards.name: Olga Safronova
cards.text: [action]: Test [willpower] + [agility] (8) to attempt to shake Olga out of her trance. As an additional cost, you may spend any number of actions when initiating this test. For each additional action spent, reduce the difficulty of this test by 3. If you succeed, flip this card over.

cards.flavor: "Vanish, I must vanish. We must die! Die! Die!"
cards.name: Patricia Simms
cards.text: Aloof. Elusive. Revelation - Place one of the set-aside keys on Patricia Simms. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: If Patricia Simms is unengaged, move her 1 location away from the nearest investigator (to a location with no investigators, if possible). If she is engaged, disengage her instead.

cards.flavor: "Names which begin with the letter 'S' are the names of snakes," babbles Patricia, her knees pressed against her chest. "Darkness, Tears, and Sighs. I could explain everything to you, but I think it would be wrong."
cards.name: Patricia Simms
cards.text: [action]: Test [willpower] + [combat] (8) to attempt to shake Patricia out of her trance. As an additional cost, you may spend any number of actions when initiating this test. For each additional action spent, reduce the difficulty of this test by 3. If you succeed, flip this card over.

cards.flavor: Sarah's quiet song has become a shrieking wail of anguish.
cards.name: Sarah Pierce
cards.text: Aloof. Retaliate. Revelation - Place one of the set-aside keys on Sarah Pierce. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: If Sarah Pierce is unengaged, move her 1 location away from the nearest investigator (to a location with no investigators, if possible). If she is engaged, disengage her instead.

cards.flavor: You discover Sarah with her cheek pressed against the wallpaper, humming a haunting melody into the corner. When you coax her around, her glazed and bewildered eyes dilate in the light.
cards.name: Sarah Pierce
cards.text: [action]: Test [willpower] + [intellect] (8) to attempt to shake Sarah out of her trance. As an additional cost, you may spend any number of actions when initiating this test. For each additional action spent, reduce the difficulty of this test by 3. If you succeed, flip this card over.

cards.name: Kenophobia
cards.text: Revelation - Place Kenophobia in your threat area. Forced - If you end your turn in a location with no enemies or other investigators: Take 1 horror and discard a random card from your hand. [action][action]: Discard Kenophobia.

cards.flavor:
"In the universe there are things that are known and things 
that are unknown, and in between them there are doors."
---William Blake
cards.name: Liminal Dread
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, attach Liminal Dread to a connecting location (unrevealed, if possible). If you cannot, take 1 horror and Liminal Dread gains surge. Forced - When an investigator enters the attached location: That investigator takes 1 horror and must immediately end their turn. Discard Liminal Dread.

cards.flavor:
"Cities, like dreams, are made of desires and fears..." 
---Italo Calvino, Invisible Cities
cards.name: Collective Unconscious
cards.text: Revelation - Attach this card to the nearest location with clues remaining. Forced - When you would discover a clue at Collective Unconscious's location: Move that clue to a connecting location, instead.

cards.name: Locus of Control
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Locus of Control to your location. While you are at Locus of Control's location, tests you are taking get +X difficulty. X is your number of connecting locations. [action][action]: Discard Locus of Control.

cards.name: Urban Decay
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Urban Decay to your location. Forced - When you would succeed at any test at Urban Decay's location, you must also test [willpower] (X), where X is your location's shroud. If you fail, choose one: - You take 1 direct horror. - You fail your original test. [action]: Add 1 doom to the agenda and discard Urban Decay. This doom may cause the agenda to advance.

cards.name: Dark Silhouette
cards.text: Jinxed. Revelation - Put Dark Silhouette in your threat area. Forced - If you fail an investigate or evade action, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a non-[[Elite]] enemy is revealed. Spawn it at your location and discard Dark Silhouette.

cards.flavor:
"Mrs. Willis thinks the skyscrapers are out to get her. At night they make themselves still skinnier, she says, and come sneaking down the streets after her."
---Fritz Leiber, Our Lady of Darkness
cards.name: Grasping Shadow
cards.text: Hunter. Jinxed. Forced - After you evade Grasping Shadow: This enemy is defeated.

cards.flavor:
A curious notion sweeps over you: 
that someone's eyes are fixed on you, their presence 
an electric tingle at the back of your neck.
Surely that's just a figment of your imagination.
cards.name: Pale Observer
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (2). This test gets +1 difficulty for every 2 cards in your hand. If you fail, take 1 horror and Pale Observer gains surge.

cards.name: Hateful Apparition
cards.text: Spawn - Connecting location Hunter. While Hateful Apparition is at a location with a shroud of 5 or higher, it gains aloof. Forced - The shroud of Hateful Apparition's location and all connecting locations is increased by 2.

cards.flavor:
There is no death. There is only a transition 
to a different sphere of consciousness.
cards.name: Haunting
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, resolve the effects of the Jinx on the current act or agenda. If you fail by 3 or more, resolve the current Jinx twice.

cards.flavor:
"What a thing it is to be a ghost, cowering and shivering in an altered world, a prey to apprehension and despair!" 
---Ambrose Bierce, The Moonlit Road
cards.name: Malevolent Presence
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (2). For each point you fail by, take 1 damage. If a Jinxed card is at your location, Malevolent Presence gains surge unless two or more cards are committed to this test.

cards.flavor:
You don't have to worry anymore.
Just do as she asks.
cards.name: Daughter of Whispers
cards.text: Alert. Jinxed. Spawn - Location with most non-[[Elite]] enemies. Forced - At the end of the round, move each enemy not named Daughter of Whispers at this card’s location to a connecting location.

cards.name: Analeptic Jinx
cards.text: Jinxed. Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, put Analeptic Jinx in your threat area. Forced - When any number of clues are discovered at your location: Heal an equal amount of damage from the nearest eligible enemy. [action]: Remove the top non-weakness card of your deck from the game. Discard Analeptic Jinx.

cards.flavor:
"No dancer will be able to tread as lightly as you, 
but every step you take will feel as if you were treading upon knives."
---Hans Christian Andersen, The Little Mermaid
cards.name: Hexentanz
cards.text: Jinxed. Revelation - Put Hexentanz into play in your threat area. Forced - If you perform a move action while Hexentanz is in your threat area: For the remainder of your turn, take 1 damage each time you take a non-move action. [action][action]: Discard Hexentanz.

cards.flavor: Ālea Iacta Est.
cards.name: Cut the Thread
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, remove the [[Ally]] card with the least remaining health under an investigator's control from the game. If no card is removed from the game in this way, you must take 1 direct damage and Cut the Thread gains surge.

cards.flavor:
"Anoint and away! Anoint and away! To the Dance that never dies!" 
---Algernon Blackwood, "Ancient Sorceries"
cards.name: Witches' Sabbath
cards.text: Revelation - Choose one of the following actions (investigate, fight, evade, or parley) and put Witches' Sabbath into play next to the agenda deck. You cannot choose an action that has already been chosen by a copy of this effect in play. Forced - When any investigator succeeds at the chosen action: That investigator triggers the current Jinx. [free]: Take 1 direct damage and 1 direct horror. Discard 1 copy of Witches' Sabbath. Any investigator may trigger this action.

cards.name: Evil Eye
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, for each point you failed by: Exhaust a non-permanent, non-weakness asset under your control. If you cannot exhaust an asset, you must either discard a non-permanent, non-weakness asset or take 1 horror.

cards.flavor:
"You who will come for us all, 
kind and gentle be your kiss."
cards.name: Daughter of Darkness
cards.text: Aloof. Jinxed. Spawn - Location with most remaining clues (no enemies, if possible). Forced - While Daughter of Darkness is ready, enemies with hunter resolve their hunter keyword twice.

cards.name: Malignant Jinx
cards.text: Jinxed. Revelation - Test [agility] (3). If you fail, put Malignant Jinx in your threat area. Forced - When any investigator draws an enemy from the encounter deck: Take 1 damage. Forced - At the end of your turn, test [willpower] (2). If you succeed, discard Malignant Jinx. If there is an exhausted enemy at your location, this test automatically succeeds.

cards.flavor:
"The fold stands empty in the drowned field,
And crows are fatted with the murrain flock."
---William Shakespeare, A Midsummer Night's Dream
cards.name: Murrain
cards.text: Jinxed. Revelation - Put Murrain into play next to the agenda deck. Forced - While Murrain is in play, each non-[[Elite]] enemy in play gets an additional +1 fight, +1 evade and gains hunter. [action] Discard any number of cards from your hand with a minimum of 3 matching icons: Discard Murrain. Any investigator may trigger this ability.

cards.name: Three-Fold Evils
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - Reveal the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Then, choose one:- Choose and discard 1 card. Resolve the two remaining cards in the order you revealed them. - Choose and discard 2 cards. Choose another investigator to draw the remaining card. That card gains peril and surge. - Discard all 3 cards. Add 1 doom to the agenda. This doom may cause the agenda to advance.

cards.flavor:
She peered too far beyond the veil, 
and now all that's left of her is despair.
cards.name: Daughter of Grief
cards.text: Spawn - Revealed location with least clues. Jinxed. Retaliate. Forced - When a [[Hex]] or [[Curse]] card is drawn from the encounter deck, Daughter of Grief attacks the investigator closest to her, regardless of their location. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Profane Jinx
cards.text: Jinxed. Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, put Profane Jinx in your threat area. You get –1 [willpower], –1 [intellect], –1 [combat], and –1[agility]. Forced - At the end of your turn, test your lowest stat (3). If you succeed, discard Profane Jinx. If there is an exhausted enemy at your location, this test automatically succeeds.

cards.name: Cataract
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Cataract to any non-[[Elite]] enemy in play that is at a location. If there are no enemies in play at locations, gains surge. [reaction] If the enemy Cataract is attached to is defeated, or if you succeed at a fight or evade test against the attached enemy by 2 or more: Discard Cataract. Forced - At the end of the Mythos Phase: Put 1 doom on Cataract.

cards.flavor:
"We shall see that at which dogs howl in the dark, 
and that at which cats prick up their ears after midnight."
---H.P. Lovecraft, From Beyond
cards.name: Darkening Skies
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Darkening Skies to your location. This location gets +2 shroud. Each connecting location gets +1 shroud. [free] Resolve the current Jinx: Discard Darkening Skies.

cards.name: Downpour
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Downpour to your location. As an additional cost to take a non-move action at this location: Spend 1 resource. [free] Resolve the current Jinx: Discard Downpour.

cards.name: Winds of Fate
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Winds of Fate to the nearest location without an existing copy of Winds of Fate. Forced - After you leave this location: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded. You must either spawn that enemy at this location, or that enemy attacks you (from the discard pile). If no enemy is discarded, take 1 damage instead. [free] Resolve the current Jinx: Discard Winds of Fate.

cards.flavor:
"It seems such a disservice to allow you a boring death. 
Let's fix that, shall we?"
cards.name: Ana Giuliano
cards.text: Jinxed. Retaliate. Forced - When Ana Giuliano would take any amount of damage, if she has any Barrier tokens on her: Cancel that damage and remove 1 Barrier token from her, instead. Forced - At the end of the round, if Ana Giuliano has less than her maximum Barrier tokens on her: Place X Barrier tokens on her, to her maximum Barrier value. X is Ana Giuliano's maximum Barrier value minus the number of Binding Charms in the victory display.

cards.name: Binding Charm
cards.text: Jinxed. Forced - If a card that Binding Charm is attached to is defeated: Remove this card from the game. Do not put it in the victory display. [action]: Test any skill (5). If you succeed, add Binding Charm to the victory display. You may spend any combination of 2 [per_investigator] clues or resources to automatically succeed.

cards.name: Queenly Majesty
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Queenly Majesty to Ana Giuliano. You may not use Fast cards against Ana Giuliano. Forced - After you perform a fight action against Ana Giuliano: She gets +2 fight until the end of the round. Discard Queenly Majesty.
